title: Angular Mastery
description: Master Angular, the powerful framework for building dynamic web applications. This course covers core concepts, advanced features, and best practices to help you create scalable, high-performance apps.
about: This comprehensive Angular course is designed to transform you into a skilled frontend developer. Learn to build robust and dynamic single-page applications (SPAs) while mastering Angular's features and tools.

highlights.name: Component-based Architecture
highlights.description: Understand the building blocks of Angular applications.

highlights.name: Routing and Navigation
highlights.description: Learn to create seamless user experiences with Angular Router.

highlights.name: State Management
highlights.description: Manage application state effectively using RxJS and NgRx.

highlights.name: Performance Optimization
highlights.description: Optimize Angular apps for speed and efficiency.

highlights.name: Testing and Debugging
highlights.description: Write unit and end-to-end tests using Jasmine and Protractor.

faq.question: What is the duration of the Angular Mastery course?
faq.answer: The course spans three months with flexible scheduling.

faq.question: Will I receive a certificate upon completion of the course?
faq.answer: Yes, a certificate will be provided upon successful completion.

faq.question: What kind of support will I receive during the course?
faq.answer: You will receive mentorship, live sessions, and community support.

faq.question: Do I need prior experience with Angular?
faq.answer: No prior experience is required. The course is designed for all skill levels.

faq.question: Will the course cover advanced Angular features?
faq.answer: Yes, the course provides comprehensive coverage of advanced features such as RxJS and NgRx.
